summary: An email dated August 19, 2019, requesting assistance from the FBI/NYPD Violent Crimes & Joint Bank Robbery Squad to identify Bureau of Prisons (BOP) employees by their full names and dates of birth. The request is urgent, needed by 5:30 PM, to assist an analyst working on the case.

events.title: Request for BOP Employee Information
events.description: An urgent request is made to the FBI/NYPD Violent Crimes & Joint Bank Robbery Squad for the full names and dates of birth of BOP employees to assist an analyst on the case.

keyFacts: The document is an urgent email request dated August 19, 2019, for identifying information on BOP employees.
The request is directed to the FBI/NYPD Violent Crimes & Joint Bank Robbery Squad, indicating inter-agency cooperation.
The information is needed by 5:30 PM to assist an analyst, suggesting time-sensitive investigative work related to the Epstein case.
The request implies that BOP employees are relevant to the investigation, possibly related to Epstein's incarceration or events surrounding it.
The document reference 'C-19 EMI EFTA00019326' appears to be a case or file identifier.
